name: Pokémon Red and Green (JP) / Red and Blue (INTL)
description: The games that started the franchise, introducing the Kanto region and 151 Pokémon.

name: Pokémon Yellow
description: Special Pikachu edition tying in with the anime; Pikachu follows the player.

name: Pokémon Gold and Silver
description: Introduced the Johto region, new Pokémon, day/night cycle, breeding.

name: Pokémon Crystal
description: Enhanced version of Gold and Silver; first with animated Pokémon sprites.

name: Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire
description: Introduced Hoenn region, double battles, abilities, new Pokémon.

name: Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen
description: Remakes of Gen I games with updated graphics and features.

name: Pokémon Emerald
description: Enhanced version of Ruby and Sapphire with added story elements.

name: Pokémon Diamond and Pearl
description: Introduced Sinnoh region, online battles/trading, physical/special split.

name: Pokémon Platinum
description: Enhanced version of Diamond and Pearl with expanded story and features.

name: Pokémon HeartGold and SoulSilver
description: Remakes of Gold/Silver with added Pokéwalker support.

name: Pokémon Black and White
description: Introduced Unova region and fully animated Pokémon sprites.

name: Pokémon Black 2 and White 2
description: Direct sequels set two years after Black/White with expanded story.

name: Pokémon X and Y
description: Introduced 3D graphics, Mega Evolution, and the Kalos region.

name: Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire
description: Remakes of Ruby/Sapphire with updated 3D graphics.

name: Pokémon Sun and Moon
description: Set in Alola, introduced trials, regional variants, no traditional gyms.

name: Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon
description: Enhanced versions of Sun and Moon with alternate storylines.

name: Pokémon Let’s Go, Pikachu! and Let’s Go, Eevee!
description: Remakes of Yellow with simplified catching mechanics.

name: Pokémon Sword and Shield
description: First main series on Switch; introduced Galar region and Dynamax/Gigantamax.

name: Pokémon Brilliant Diamond and Shining Pearl
description: Remakes of Diamond/Pearl with modern graphics.

name: Pokémon Legends: Arceus
description: Prequel open-world RPG set in ancient Sinnoh (Hisui region).

name: Pokémon Scarlet and Violet
description: Open-world RPG set in Paldea with Terastal phenomenon.
